channel.title: The Limitless Podcast
channel.description:
A podcast series by millennial women of colour “for woke women/girls that love dumb stuff”.

Scintillating, quirky, fun, intelligent and motivating conversations hosted by three young millennial women with diverse backgrounds. Each season, we invite guests that are aligned with a topical discussion to unpack in conversation and discussions a series of trending topics such as the challenges the youth and millennials face, adulting, state of the culture, society, social media, pop culture, fashion, music, tech and entrepreneurship.

The aim is to create content that stimulates thinking, drives conversations and creates a new African narrative of thought leaders.

Recorded and produced at https://SolidGoldStudios.co.za #BeHeard
channel.itunes:subtitle: The podcast for woke girls that love dumb stuff.
channel.itunes:author: Studio.13 | Solid Gold Podcast Studios

item.author: limitless@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Studio.13 | Solid Gold Podcast Studios)
item.itunes:author: Studio.13 | Solid Gold Podcast Studios
item.title: Vulnerable Confessions (and other dumb stuff)
item.itunes:title: Vulnerable Confessions (and other dumb stuff)
item.itunes:subtitle: We issued a disclaimer when we started, sometimes, we get VERY silly
item.description:
Hey Limitless Fam. We love random chit chats and in this episode, we are just happy to have Lebo back in the pod with us. This is literally our first catch-up episode, all together! Carla gets deep into her thoughts about the reality show ""Real Housewives of Johannesburg""... maybe a little too deep. We discuss the rise of ""celebrity vulnerable confessions"", we are so torn, we are simply struggling to figure out if these are genuine expressions of vulnerability or just a publicity stunt for more album sales? We did warn you and it's in our tagline, sometimes, we are going to have fun, light and sometimes overly dumb conversations. This is our way of maintaining balance and having fun in between the growing and developing. The Limitless Podcast is very much an independent vehicle that runs on the support of our incredible listeners - that's you! So, if you’d like to support the show, we would like that very much. Hit ‘subscribe’ on Apple Podcasts or ‘follow’ on Spotify, and leave a review if you’re feeling especially generous. Then sit back and bask in our eternal, abundant love. Your hosts are Carla Fernandes (@carlaxiii), Dominique Reeby (@dominiqueiam) and Lebo Ndaba (@leboga)

Music Used : Earning Happiness | https://johnbartmann.com/about/


https://www.instagram.com/limitless.podcast.sa The Limitless Podcast is a production of Studio.13. Work with us. We have great advertising and brand opportunities available.

https://studio13mkt.wixsite.com/website


If you're ready to produce your own podcast, contact the podcast experts at SolidGoldStudios.co.za

item.author: limitless@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Studio.13 | Solid Gold Podcast Studios)
item.itunes:author: Studio.13 | Solid Gold Podcast Studios
item.title: The Year of the Underdog... This is YOUR year!
item.itunes:title: The Year of the Underdog... This is YOUR year!
item.itunes:subtitle: Time to commit to yourself. Make this your best year yet.
item.description:
Hey Limitless Fam. We are so amped to get this year into gear. We are dreaming BIG and manifesting beyond our wildest imaginations. Why not?! Give yourself permission to dream it real. Getting mentally and emotionally fit to tackle your dreams and wants is key. Maybe you are a vision board kind of person, or maybe goal lists better suit you. Whatever works for you do more of that. Do what you need to do to give you that edge and keep you motivated and inspired. In this episode, Dominique and Carla are in the pod, setting the tone for the podcast this year. We are bringing it on! Super cool guests: trailblazers, thought leaders and trend makers. We look forward to an amazing year with you. The Limitless Podcast is very much an independent vehicle that runs on the support of our incredible listeners - that's you! So, if you’d like to support the show, we would like that very much. Hit ‘subscribe’ on Apple Podcasts or ‘follow’ on Spotify, and leave a review if you’re feeling especially generous. Then sit back and bask in our eternal, abundant love. Your hosts are Carla Fernandes (@carlaxiii), Dominique reeby (@dominiqueiam) and Lebo Ndaba (@leboga)

Music Used : Earning Happiness | https://johnbartmann.com/about/


Join our community on Instagram. Let us know your thoughts and connect with us. https://www.instagram.com/limitless.podcast.sa

The Limitless Podcast is a production of Studio.13. Work with us. We have great advertising and brand opportunities available. https://studio13mkt.wixsite.com/website


If you're ready to produce your own podcast, contact the podcast experts at SolidGoldStudios.co.za

item.author: limitless@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Studio.13 | Solid Gold Podcast Studios)
item.itunes:author: Studio.13 | Solid Gold Podcast Studios
item.title: Limitless Conversations with Sphum: African Girl Magic | Sphum Radebe
item.itunes:title: Limitless Conversations with Sphum: African Girl Magic | Sphum Radebe
item.itunes:subtitle: Women from the African continent are reaching new levels.
item.description:
In this episode delve into what should totally be a thing – 'African Girl Magic'. What a magical year it has been for the continent, moreover for African women. South Africa's very own Zozibini Tunzi is the reigning Miss Universe. Bonang Matheba made it to the Breakfast Club and our gorgeous Guest star Sphum has released an EP - ""What Doesn't Kill You"". We discuss the EP as well as the intricacies of the South African music industry particularly the RnB scene for female artists.

Music Used : Earning Happiness | https://johnbartmann.com/about/


Follow us on Instagram https://www.instagram.com/limitless.podcast.sa

Work with us. We have great advertising and brand opportunities available. https://studio13mkt.wixsite.com/website


If you're ready to produce your own podcast, contact the podcast experts at SolidGoldStudios.co.za

item.title: A Year of Life and Love Lessons... Thank you, Next!
item.itunes:title: A Year of Life and Love Lessons... Thank you, Next!
item.itunes:subtitle: A whole new decade is upon us. Are you into New Year resolutions?
item.description:
In this episode, we begin the journey of wrapping up the year and discuss the things we are leaving in 2019 and the things we are taking with us into 2020. Life, life and everything in between. Want to hear more? SUBSCRIBE to stay up to date with new episodes.


Here's a video worth watching on this subject https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CqTyOCSXO9Q

item.author: limitless@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Studio.13 | Solid Gold Podcast Studios)
item.itunes:author: Studio.13 | Solid Gold Podcast Studios
item.title: This is US! We come with baggage.
item.itunes:title: This is US! We come with baggage.
item.itunes:subtitle: Our very first episode. We come with a lot baggage, already!
item.description:
Our very first episode and we get right into it! We come with weeks' worth of baggage. In this episode: We unpack a little about ourselves as well as a few trending topics of the week - #KFCProposal and how Twitter finally came together for the greater good. The men behind the nation-building, how SA winning the Rugby World Cup resulted in uber-friendliness on the road. Dominique spills the beans on her adventures and the backlash received when shared with work-mates and Lebo reveals her 'dark' secret. Have we left you wanting to hear more? Then hit 'SUBSCRIBE' now.


Carla Fernandes on Instagram https://www.instagram.com/carlaxiii

Dominique Reeby on Instagram https://www.instagram.com/dominiqueiam

Lebogang Ndaba on Instagram https://www.instagram.com/leboga

Music Used : Earning Happiness | https://johnbartmann.com/about/


Follow us on Instagram https://www.instagram.com/limitless.podcast.sa

Work with us. We have great advertising and brand opportunities available. https://studio13mkt.wixsite.com/website


If you're ready to produce your own podcast, contact the podcast experts at SolidGoldStudios.co.za
